item.title: Anti-Trump influencers flood the White House’s new TikTok account
item.description: The rocky rollout of the president’s official presence on the social platform showcases the challenges he faces among younger people online.

item.title: Obama condemns ‘horrific’ Kirk shooting, urges country to unite
item.description: Former president Barack Obama called the killing of Kirk a tragedy, and said the Trump administration was wrong to try and sow division after the shoo...

item.title: The GOP cut parts of Obamacare. Now it’s at the center of a funding fight.
item.description: Democrats are asking for restored health care subsidies and funding in exchange for their support, but Republicans are daring them to risk a shutdown ...

item.title: U.S. wins release of American who had been barred from leaving China
item.description: Beijing has allowed Mao Chenyue, a Wells Fargo employee from Atlanta, to return to the United States, people familiar with the matter said.

item.title: Tim Walz launches bid for reelection as Minnesota governor amid 2028 speculation
item.description: The Democratic governor is far better known nationally after serving as his party’s 2024 vice-presidential candidate.
